## ğŸ“¥ Installation

1. Download or clone this repository
2. Place the `enow-info` folder in your FiveM server's `resources` directory
3. Add `ensure enow-info` to your `server.cfg`
4. Restart your server

## ğŸ“¦ Dependencies

- QB-Core Framework
